index.SUPPORT_SERVICE_TEXT: 像免费服务一样，希望它能够持续下去吗？
index.DONATE_TEXT: 我们接受通过PayPal捐款，如果您有兴趣（没有义务），您可以通过给我们钱来买一杯咖啡来捐款来支持我们
index.API_TEXT: 如果要在软件，项目或服务器中使用OpenBlu，可以使用OpenBlu API轻松访问所有可用服务器。 您可以从免费套餐（有限的请求）开始，并确定它是否适合您。
index.CARD_POPULAR_SERVERS_TEXT: 具有最多会话的最流行的服务器

servers.PAGE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: 找不到请求的页面，它可能已被移动
servers.NO_SERVERS_AVAILABLE_ERROR: 目前没有可用的服务器，请稍后再试
servers.CALLBACK_100: 您找不到的服务器或OpenBlu上的服务器不再可用
servers.NOTIFICATION_AUTH_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: 要防止垃圾邮件和滥用，您需要登录/注册才能下载此配置文件
servers.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: 尝试处理您的请求时出错，请尝试刷新此页面。
servers.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STARTED_MESSAGE: 您的OpenVPN配置文件应该开始下载

server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_IP_ADDRESS_DESC: The IP Address of the remote VPN Server
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_COUNTRY_DESC: The country that this server is based in
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_CURRENT_SESSIONS_DES: The total amount of users that are currently connected
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_TOTAL_SESSIONS_DESC: The total amount of sessions this server had (all time)
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_ID_DESC: The ID of the OpenBlu VPN Server
server.CARD_CONNECT_OPENVPN_DESC: You can connect to this server using a OpenVPN client with any supported device, the download to the configuration file (.ovpn) is available below
server.CARD_CONNECT_CLIENT_DESC: By clicking connect your client will start a OpenVPN session, you can close the connection by closing the OpenVPN Client.
server.NOTIFICATION_AUTH_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: To prevent spam & abuse, you need to login/register to download this configuration file
server.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error while trying to process your request, try refreshing this page.
server.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STARTED_MESSAGE: Your OpenVPN Configuration file should start downloading

api.PRICING_HEADER: Start adding VPNs to your software solutions
api.PRICING_DESC: Choose a plan that suits you the best. You can also try the API for free for personal use / small projects
api.CURRENT_PLAN_ALERT: Your billing cycle will only be processed when the API is being used, your plan will not be cancelled unless you cancel it manually
api.CURRENT_PLAN_ROW_PLAN_TYPE_DESC: The current plan that this API is running on
api.CURRENT_PLAN_ROW_MONTHLY_CALLS_DESC: The amount of monthly calls you can make with this plan
api.CURRENT_PLAN_ROW_BILLING_CYCLE_DESC: The date for when the system will process your next billing cycle
api.CANCEL_DIALOG_ALERT: You will not be refunded if you cancel your subscription, if you want to request a refund you must contact support after cancelling your subscription.
api.CANCEL_DIALOG_TEXT: Once you cancel your subscription, your API access will be revoked and you can purchase another subscription to reactivate your API. If you simply want to change your API Key or certificate then you can update your signatures instead of canceling your subscription.
api.AUTHENTICATION_CARD_DESC: Authentication details for using the OpenBlu API
api.CALLBACK_101: Your signatures has been re-generated and updated
api.CALLBACK_102: There was an error while trying to re-generate signatures, please contact support.
api.CALLBACK_103: There was an error while trying download the certificate, please contact support.
api.CALLBACK_104: There was an error while trying cancel your plan, please contact support.
api.WARNING_INACTIVE_PLAN: Your plan is currently not active due to insufficient funds in your account
api.CURRENT_USAGE_WARNING: You have %s requests available till your next billing cycle, if you need more requests you should consider upgrading
api.CURRENT_USAGE_ERROR: You have used up your monthly calls, on the next billing cycle will your current usage will reset. If you need more requests you should consider upgrading

login.CALLBACK_100: There was an issue with your request, please make sure your browser is up to date
login.CALLBACK_103: There was an issue while trying to verify your login details, please contact support
login.CALLBACK_104: Captcha verification failed, please solve the captcha correctly
login.CALLBACK_105: The server cannot verify your client, please restart the application and try again
login.CALLBACK_106: There was an issue while trying to verify your client, please contact support.
login.CALLBACK_107: There was an issue while trying to retrieve your account, please contact support.

register.TOS: By creating an account you are accepting our Terms & Conditions
register.CALLBACK_100: There was an issue with your request, please make sure your browser is up to date
register.CALLBACK_103: The given password is invalid, it should be greater than 8 characters but no greater than 128
register.CALLBACK_104: The given Username is already taken
register.CALLBACK_105: The given E-Mail is already used
register.CALLBACK_106: There was an issue while trying to create your account, please contact support
register.CALLBACK_108: Captcha verification failed, please solve the captcha correctly

confirm_purchase.DETAILS_DESC: Please confirm the purchase of this subscription.
confirm_purchase.PROMOTION_DESC: If you have a promotion code to receive a special offer, you can enter it below and verify it
confirm_purchase.CALLBACK_101: You have insufficient funds in your account to start this subscription
confirm_purchase.CALLBACK_102: You are not allowed to make any purchases, please contact support
confirm_purchase.CALLBACK_103: A subscription is already active, this transaction cannot be completed

login_required.CARD_DESC: You need to be logged in to continue downloading more configurations, this helps us prevent crawlers and spam

404.CARD_DESCRIPTION: The page you were looking for was not found

500.CARD_DESCRIPTION: 处理您的请求时出现问题，请重试或报告支持

add_balance.FAQ_HEADER: 在向帐户余额中添加资金之前，请先阅读以下信息（仅限英文）
add_balance.ADD_BALANCE_DESC: 请确保您的Intellivoid帐户的电子邮件与您的PayPal电子邮件相同，如果它们不同，则使用您的PayPal交易ID（购买后）和您的Intellivoid帐户用户名或电子邮件向％s发送电子邮件。 如果您未能向我们提供所需信息，那么您将获得退款

support.CARD_DESC: 使用下面的表格，您可以联系我们以获取有关OpenBlu的技术支持或提出问题/提出要求。 提交支持表格后，您将收到一个票号，一旦我们通过电子邮件回复您，将作为参考。
support.EMAIL_LABEL: 电子邮件（必须有效才能获得回复）
support.SUBJECT_LABEL: 主题（最少5个字符，最多130个字符）
support.MESSAGE_LABEL: 消息（最少20个字符，最多2500个字符）
support.CALLBACK_100: 您的请求存在问题，请确保您的浏览器是最新的
support.CALLBACK_101: 给定的电子邮件地址无效
support.CALLBACK_102: 给定的主题无效，必须大于5个字符但不得大于130
support.CALLBACK_103: 给定的消息无效，必须大于20个字符但不大于2500
support.CALLBACK_104: 尝试处理您的报告时出现未知错误，请等到Intellivoid解决此问题
support.CALLBACK_105: 您的报告已提交，我们会尽快与您联系。 您的票号为#%s
support.CALLBACK_106: 验证码被错误地解决了
